description:
nova-compute can't start up because exceptions are raised in _destroy_evacuated_instances.

Here is the log:

title: nova-compute failed to start due to exception raised in _destroy_evacuated_instances

comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~felix23ma

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/265681
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/265681
Committed: https://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/nova/commit/?id=007137e9efe1499c6f489f7f65c44e2e79ae7418
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit 007137e9efe1499c6f489f7f65c44e2e79ae7418
Author: maqi <email address hidden>
Date:   Mon Jan 11 11:46:32 2016 +0800

    Catch iscsi VolumeDeviceNotFound when detaching
    
    If exceptions are raised, nova-compute can't start
    when executing _destroy_evacuated_instances.
    
    Change-Id: I0a2877ec0f922d2bc9a742d1c2c2540a6b77e9ce
    Closes-Bug: #1532657
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content: This issue was fixed in the openstack/nova 13.0.0.0b3 development milestone.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~doug-hellmann
